entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure ability to customize the HtmlEncoder used for the RazorComponentEndpoint #47477
    .NET 8 Planning
  • HttpContext.Session.GetString is Always Return Null in .NET Core 6 #47476
  • System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException when moving grpc server to dotnet 8 #47475
  • [Blazor] DotnetStreams bug #47473
  • Onboard aspnetcore into the new TimeProvider type from runtime #47472
    .NET 8.0
  • [ASPNET Core 2.1] src\SignalR\clients\csharp\Http.Connections.Client\src\HttpConnection.cs should null check logging scope before disposing #47470
  • Blazor - JavaScript interop returns the wrong values for some types in production builds #47468
  • Please consider Extensions to Blazor WASM elements? #47466
  • Consider changing AlphaRouteConstraint to use IndexOfAnyValues instead of Regex #47463
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Build error when using RDG with a route handler that returns a type explicitly implementing IResult #47462
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Using 3rd-party identity providers is simple ... until you need auth for Swagger😱 or need to write a client #47461
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Analyzer] Prefer HttpRequest.ReadFormAsync over HttpRequest.Form #47460
  • Replace QueryStringEnumerable.SpanHelper with MemoryExtensions.Replace #47457
  • Rate Limiting - Ability to consume a variable amount of tokens per request #47456

Closed

  • Perf regression: json #47446
  • img decoding="async" with blazor #47449
  • DeveloperExceptionPage showing and disappearing fast #46859
  • AzureADB2C.UI v7 release #47458
  • Renaming component breaks css isolation #47270
  • IJSObjectReference module import path error #47430
  • Incorrect results of RangeAttribute #47434
  • How to paramterise a partial containing 'expression names'? #45845
  • dotnet new mvc with -rrc -f net7.0 can't work #47429
  • [Analyzer] Warn about `HttpRequest.Form` #44390
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Is it possible to use PKCE - Proof Key for Code Exchange on Azure AD App Registration + Blazor Server ? How to do it? #43668
  • select component value becomes null on change when having a CascadingParameter parameter #41453
  • Perf workflow tool #15241

PullRequests

Created

  • change 'ValuesController' to 'ValueController' #47474
    area-mvc
  • Null check nullable Scope before disposing in SignalR HttpConnection.cs #47471
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 2.1.x
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in ForwardedHeadersMiddleware #47459
    Perf, area-runtime, feature-middleware
  • Bump okhttp to 4.10.0 #47455
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Create Linux-Musl Redistributable Artifacts #47451
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Update SDK #47441
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Clean up unnecessary suppressions #47440
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add analyzer/codefixer to use AddAuthorizationBuilder #47428
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Use Json TypeInfoResolverChain #47450
    area-web-frameworks
  • Flow FullAssemblySigningSupported for source-build to repo tasks #47421
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Hash routing to named element #47320
    area-blazor
  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play (Redux) #47454
    area-runtime
  • Bump gson to 2.8.9. #47453
    area-signalr
